reference_summary:
No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'}
I like the smell of this and how light it is. It does kinda feel like jelly and doesn’t lather up super great for me, but it gets the job done and makes my face feel good. Haven’t broken out or had irritated skin from it. The smell is light and reminds me of something I can’t put my finger on...maybe light citrus candy or something? It smells pretty good to me and I enjoy washing with this in the shower. Good size too!
A pleasant, non-irritating face wash
Study Buddy Clay Mask with Detoxifying Bentonite, 3 fl. oz., Exfoliates, Brightens and Clears Pores, Clay Draws Out Impurities and Improves Skin's Texture and Tone by Higher Education Skincare
Higher Education
{'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Scent': 'Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.6 x 3.6 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381035006'}
I love a good face mask - this hits all the marks for me. It is thick and basically feels like wet pottery in your hands (hence the clay), smells nice (somewhat perfume-y) and most importantly, feels like something I’d get at a spa. When I first put it on, I was surprised by the warming sensation, since I didn’t realize it had that effect. I liked it! I’ve had masks like that before and they just add another dimension to the experience. I left it on for 10 minutes and washed it right off. Some clay masks I’ve used are hard to wash off - not this one. Face felt smooth and had no irritation afterward. I really like this brand.
Warming sensation is so good
Butt Naked Baby Organic Sunshine Lotion | Everyday Moisturizer | Lightweight, Non-Greasy | Normal-to-Dry Skin | Aloe, Shea Butter, Sunflower Oil, Calendula, White Tea, Green Tea, Rooibos Tea, Lemon Oil | 6.7 oz
Butt Naked Baby
{'Brand': 'Butt Naked Baby', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin_e', 'Unit Count': '6.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.24 x 2.09 inches; 7.8 Ounces'}
I really wanted to like this. The name, packaging and labeling is cute. “The 91%” organic label on the front was odd, yet reassuring that they are a transparent and honest brand (I mean, where else have you seen such a random percentage?) Yet, when I smelled it, I did not like it. At all. I can’t describe it really; it’s a faint, cheap perfumey sunflower smell. I didn’t like it for our toddler and couldn’t even tolerate it for me. I wouldn’t say I’m really that picky of a person, but I just didn’t jive with the smell. I even offered it to my husband because he likes organic lotions for the back of his arms where he has some KP but even he didn’t like it! I guess in a pinch we could use it, but it will not be preferred over other scents.
The packaging is cute, the smell is not
NEW Challenger Men's Rinse Free Hand Wash - 1oz - Portable, 30% Alcohol Hand Wash both Cleans & Moisturizes. Hydrates Hands, Forearms, & Skin - Cleansing 30% Alc. Based Formula Washes and Nourishes
Challenger

Clean fresh scent and well moisturized after using. Not greasy at all, very happy with quality of this product. Sleek packaging and convenient size for car, home, or even keeping in your pockets. I highly recommend.
Good option for hand sanitizer
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Concern:** Prefers products suitable for dry and sensitive skin, emphasizing non-irritating formulations that hydrate without causing breakouts or irritation.
- **Product Functionality:** Values gentle, effective cleansing; recently appreciated a clay mask that detoxifies and improves skin texture. Open to versatile formulations, as shown by a positive experience with a moisturizing hand wash that maintains skin hydration.
- **Scent Preference:** Enjoys light, pleasant scents, particularly citrus or sweet notes, and values freshness, as indicated by the favorable review of a product with a clean scent. Previous negative experiences underscore the need for enjoyable, non-perfumy fragrances.
- **Texture Preference:** Favors lightweight textures but also enjoys the thick, clay-like formulations of masks. The appreciation for a moisturizing hand wash points to a preference for products that offer both cleansing and hydration without greasy residues.
- **Usage Context:** Integrates skincare routines into daily activities, seeking convenient, easy-to-use products. Recent interactions show a continued interest in portable options that enhance self-care moments.
- **Purchase Consideration:** Evaluates products based on quality performance and sensory experience, with an inclination towards pampering experiences and effective results that align with personal care needs. 

Overall, the user maintains a clear focus on gentleness, sensory pleasure in effective skincare solutions, and emphasizes the importance of fragrance and product functionality in their selections.
